reviewText: 4 stars for flawed but wonderful gem of a film; 5 stars for the 2 separate amazing commentaries with James Gray & Steven Soderbergh.
James Gray delivers a great film. Great cast. Joaquin Phoenix, Mark Wahlberg, James Caan

This review is for the blu ray disc and not the film! This blu ray is atrocious, the video is terrible, the OAR is cropped from what should be 2.35 and we are given a 1.85 image. No subtitles!! There are scenes in Spanish that cannot be translated!! I enjoy this film but this disc has taken that away. Stay away!!! Thought this re-release would be improved by Lionsgate but it has not!
